title: Could not compute committee assignments: could not check proposer at slot 768: could not update committee cache: empty active indices list
body:
In the devnet test environment, when I use the genesis node to generate blocks, the following error is reported after a period of time

```
time="2023-05-02 22:09:22" level=error msg="rpc error: code = Internal desc = Could not compute committee assignments: could not check proposer at slot 768: could not update committee cache: empty active indices list" prefix=validator
time="2023-05-02 22:09:22" level=error msg="Failed to update assignments" error="rpc error: code = Internal desc = Could not compute committee assignments: could not check proposer at slot 768: could not update committee cache: empty active indices list" prefix=validator

time="2023-05-02 22:10:10" level=error msg="Failed to update assignments" error="rpc error: code = Internal desc = Could not compute committee assignments: could not check proposer at slot 768: could not update committee cache: empty active indices list" prefix=validator
time="2023-05-02 22:10:22" level=error msg="rpc error: code = Internal desc = Could not compute committee assignments: could not check proposer at slot 768: could not update committee cache: empty active indices list" prefix=validator
time="2023-05-02 22:10:22" level=error msg="Failed to update assignments" error="rpc error: code = Internal desc = Could not compute committee assignments: could not check proposer at slot 768: could not update committee cache: empty active indices list" prefix=validator
```
